text: Phayttos () was a town in Pelasgiotis, ancient Thessaly, closely set with Atrax and Larissa. An inscription to Artemis dating from the 3rd century BCE was found here. Its site in near the modern village of Zarkon. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Thessaly Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Pelasgiotis
title: Phayttos
